rev.comment: /* Origins and Development of the term */ "series of twelve volumes called" - paragraph re-written for appropriate compositional structure
/* Origins and Development of the term */ "The series of twelve volumes" - Capitalize appropriate nouns for consistency in composition;
/* Origins and Development of the term */ "expel those inimical" improper sentence construction;
/* Origins and Development of the term */ Combine two "one sentence" paragraphs - RULE: In composition, avoid "one sentence" paragraphs.
/* Origins and Development of the term */Second paragraph - combine two redundant sentences into one;
/* Origins and Development of the term */ Changed "immediately after" to "immediately following";"and to defend" remove improper preposition "to"
/* Origins and Development of the term */ Combined the first two sentences into one paragraph (RULE: A new paragraph is to begin a new thought)
/* Origins and Development of the term */ Changed to "In the 1920s", correction in sentence structure; "disliked the word," remove comma - grammar
Collection of definitions and logical arrangement of thought
Institute "clean-up" to meet required quality standards
Add references to the source of the accepted definition, M-W, as compared to opinion; the correct term used by fundamentalists is "faith and practice" not "faith and morals."
